main event: A civilian reported sighting of a UFO near Dayton, Ohio on June 2, 1968, observing it for about 30 minutes.
interesting points: The observer described the object as having a 40-50 ft diameter with an elliptical shape and bright yellowish-white coloration., It had windows or portholes around its edge and no visible means of propulsion., A reddish-orange ball of fire was seen emitting heat and bluish-white light behind the object., The UFO appeared to hover, then accelerated and streaked off at high speed., The object left muddy impressions on the ground.
witness description: A civilian female, 45 years of age, residing in Beavercreek, Ohio.
